title: Alpine Escape with Discounts on Ski Hire
description: Surround yourself with snow-capped alpine vistas at Mount Hotham’s newly renovated Kalyna Ski Club. Perfectly positioned 200 metres from The Big D ski lift and within a short walk of bars, eateries and the general store, this centrally located lodge is the ideal choice for groups of friends looking to ski, socialise or simply soak up the views with a craft beer or two.  Save on ski hire with 25% discount at Snow Monkey, leave the linen at home with complimentary sheets included and stay connected thanks to free wireless internet throughout the lodge. Plus, enjoy a complimentary pot of beer 1,550 metres above sea level at Blizzard Brewing Company (with any tasting plate purchased) - Australia's highest brewery.

title: Ski-in Ski-Out Escape in Victoria’s Mt Hotham
description: Leave the city’s hustle and bustle for fresh mountain air and perfect outdoor adventures in Victoria’s most loved Alpine destination, the impressive Mount Hotham. Experience ski-in, ski-out fun in the heart of it all at Snowbird Inn, ideally located mere meters away from the Summit chairlift. Your winter escape includes hot and cold buffet breakfast, a mulled wine, beer or soft drink per person and a Bird Board to share - complete with a selection of cold cuts, cheese and bread. Bring your friends or family along: upgrade packages are valid for up to six people!
offer_address: Great Alpine Rd, Hotham Heights VIC 3741
